description: Your all-in-one AI Copilot for next level generative AI with ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and more. Boost your productivity 10x & save hours of work. Let Marve write unique, engaging and high-quality copy or content: from long-form blog posts or landing pages to digital ads in seconds. Start for free!
title: SinCode AI - AI Copywriter
introduction: SinCode AI is an all-in-one AI platform trusted by over 500,000 AI creators. It offers a range of features including unlimited word and image credits, access to advanced AI models like GPT-4 and DALL·E 3, and tools like Marve Chat and Document Editor. The platform aims to revolutionize content creation and streamline writing processes for various users.
features: Marve Chat for unlimited AI assistance
targetPeople: AI creators, copywriters, content creators, marketers, entrepreneurs, and anyone interested in AI tools
pricing: Subscription-based with different plans including a free option, starter plan, and pro plan with various features and benefits

faqs.question: How are the words calculated?
faqs.answer: The words are calculated based on the usage and credits allocated in each plan.

faqs.question: How can I get access to GPT-4?
faqs.answer: Access to GPT-4 is included in the Pro plan along with other advanced features.

faqs.question: How can I cancel my plan?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your plan at any time with secure payments powered by Stripe.

faqs.question: What are the available payment methods?
faqs.answer: Payment methods include credit/debit cards and other online payment options.
